bio:
I am a nurse, writer, mother, wife, sister, and best friend. I have been freelance writing for almost a decade and have mastered the art of SEO. I have also written several ebooks ranging from the medical niche to the survivalist niche. 

I primarily write in the medical and mental health niche, but I am also an expert researcher and can write about a wide variety of topics. 

I also write fiction as well as non-fiction essays.

abstrac: Your Vision, our knowledge, your success - Financial Support to help you achieve your goals.
bio:
Danuel Rebecca & Company formed in 2013 provides strategic financial advice to organisations in the Defence and IT sectors.  Danuel Rebecca & Company was founded by Danuel Rebecca, an MBA qualified member of the Australian Institute of Chartered Accountants.

Danuel has over 15 years experience delivering financial management to Defence companies and IT businesses.  

Danuel Rebecca & Company is called upon to develop complex financial models and pricing responses for Top Tier Australian Defence Companies, provide Chief Financial Officer services for start up businesses in the IT sector and develop financial models for capital raising.  

Danuel Rebecca & Company can help you with business advice to improve your business plans, advice on developing financial models for start-up and complex tender responses, provide virtual CFO services and assist with developing your business strategy.
Danuel Rebecca & Company can work virtually, or on-site at your premises.  Payment terms are Milestone based, with payment due 14 days after completion.

bio:
I am specialist independent Test Automation Engineer having more than 8 years of experience providing wide range of testing solutions to customer based on domain, technology and business solutions. I believe in providing high quality testing deliverable in reasonable span of time and cost.

I am able to provide Manual, Automated and high class process orientated testing solutions to customer. I am following blends cutting edge practices with sharp testing mindset to deliver value for the testing dollar. My offering includes Center of Excellence testing center for customer.

Domain I am experienced in:

Finance
Healthcare
Business Process Management
Travel
Enterprise Solutions
E-Commerce Solutions
Wireless and Mobile Applications

Specialties:
Specialized in Automation Testing, Performance testing, Security Testing, Product Testing, domain based testing (e.g. mobile, finance, retail, e-commerce trade etc.). My focus areas are to help customers as extended team on offshore and provide them full satisfactory services in third party testing which reveals them worth of their money.

Tools I am experienced in:

Functional tools: Selenium WebDriver, Selenium Grid, Appium Android, Appium iOS, Calabash, API Testing, Rest Assured, HTTP Client, Cucumber, NUnit, Junit, TestNG etc.

Performance tool: OpenSTA, LoadRunner, JMeter, Grinder etc.

CI Tools: Jenkins, Bamboo, TeamCity.

Cloud: SauceLabs

Automation Frameworks: Linear, Data Driven, Keyword Driven, Hybrid , Robot Framework(Selenium2Library)

Bug Tracking: Bugzilla, JIRA, TeamTrack and Mantis

Configuration Management Tools: VSS, CVS, SVN, Source Jammer and Perforce.

Value propositions:

# Robust quality process implementation
# Complete Lifecycle Management of Projects
# Robust test framework design
# Extensive Documentation
# On time Delivery
# Very flexible support
# no time zone issue
# fixed cost and T&M budgeting
# no advance payment structure

Thank You
Surya Tiwari

Work Terms
1.) No Advance payment structure
2.) Fixed cost or hourly based services
3.) services in customer local timezone.

abstrac: ITelSib company is specialized in software development in such areas as telecom and networking solutions, embedded and real-time systems, modern look-and-fell user interfaces, video.
bio:
The core of the ITelSib team was formed in the years 1998-1999. All ITelSib engineers have a Master’s degree or Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering, Applied Mathematics or Electrical Engineering. 
Knowledge of programming languages: C, C++, Java, C#, Python.

ITelSib offers the following outsourcing business  models:
a) Time and Materials
b) Offshore Development Center
c) Fixed Price

The “Time and Material” means that ITelSib receives specifications and tasks from the customer, fulfills them in accordance with the project plan, submits deliverables for acceptance by the customer, reports spent hours weekly and sends invoices monthly in accordance with the spent hours. 

The “Offshore Development Center” means that ITelSib assigns a team of software engineers who do not work on any other tasks except those assigned by the customer.  The customer in turn will provide ODC with task assignments in the volume necessary for fully loading all ODC developers (40 hours per person each week) and pay for all these hours as well as extra hours spent by the ODC developers.

The “Fixed Price” model means that the customer provides ITelSib with a project specification, based on which ITelSib makes an estimation of project efforts and its cost and prepares a technical proposal for the customer.  If the customer is satisfied with the cost and target dates, then the customer and ITelSib sign a contract and ITelSib starts the project.  Requests for changes may cause project efforts re-estimation and changing of the price and target dates.
Each model above involves acceptance by the customer, a 1-month bug-fixing period without extra charge, the appointment of a responsible project manager, sending weekly reports on the project status (MS Project format or any other defined by the customer), and immediate fixing of critical defects.

All property rights are completely transferred to your company unless otherwise specifically discussed and agreed upon.
